title: Aquarion Water seeking nominations
maintext:
BRIDGEPORT - The Aquarion Water Company is accepting nominations for its eighth annual Environmental Champion Awards.
The five categories are: Adult, Youth, Small Business, Large Business and Non-Profit Organization.
“There are many organizations and people throughout Connecticut who are dedicated environmental stewards that work tirelessly to preserve Connecticut’s natural resources,” said Charles V. Firlotte, President and CEO of Aquarion Water Company, said in a statement. “It’s a privilege and honor to recognize them for their outstanding commitment, and we look forward to celebrating their accomplishments during the 2018 Aquarion Environmental Champion Awards ceremony.”
The deadline for nominations is May 1, 2018. Self-nominations and re-nominations are welcome.
More information is available at www.aquarionwater.com and www.facebook.com/aquarionwater.
